synopsis.text: Heaven and Earth's delicate balance rests in the hands of an unsuspecting high school student, Yonosuke Hikura. Although he appears ordinary, he is the latest in a lineage of guardians entrusted with a vital mission to protect this harmony. Armed with the mystical sword Chitentai and accompanied by Tsukinojo Inbe, a protector dispatched by the Earth's High Priests, Yonosuke fearlessly confronts the escaped demons, ensuring their return to the Earth World. Embark on a thrilling journey as Yonosuke navigates the trials of high school and his secret duty to maintain cosmic equilibrium.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
